actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates as wilderness within the National Wildlife Refuge System specified lands in Alaska, Arizona, California, Arkansas, Delaware, Hawaii, Oregon, Maryland, Massachusetts, Minnesota, Wisconsin, Iowa, Illinois, Mississippi, Montana, Nebraska, Nevada, Oregon, North Carolina, South Carolina, Vermont and Virginia. Provides for the addition of lands to specified wilderness areas in Alaska, Arizona, Nevada and Oregon. Designates as wilderness within the National Forest System specified lands in Arizona, New Mexico, California, Colorado, Idaho, Wyoming, Montana and Utah.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands as wilderness.
